    • getIdAppFromTheList

      protected int getIdAppFromTheList(int idApp)
      Get the number of the application according to a jobOffer (If there are 2 application for the job offer 1, the index for the first application is 0, the second 1, etc...)
      Parameters:
      idApp - id of the application
      Returns:
      the index of the application group by the job offer
